website_summaries.verdict: You'll be impressed not only by the quality of your grounds, but by the high-tech design of this grinder.
pros: We loved the digital controls and back-lit LED display
You have the option to grind into the included grounds bin, or directly into your portafilter
Consistently produces quality grinds from fine to coarse in roughly 30 seconds
This machine has Bluetooth capabilities, and apps designed to monitor each grind session

customer_reviews.title: High quality espresso-only grinder
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Produces consistent results - Great grind quality - Love the automatic weight based dosing Cons: - Hard to get my portafilter (breville dual boiler) to sit centered under the opening. - ONLY for espresso/fine grind coffees, consider a different grinder for drip, cold brew, etc. (Even the alternative burr you can purchase has had mixed reviews when it comes to coarser settings). Other Notes: - Mine needed a shim (included, easy to install) to get to espresso-level grinds, so don't be afraid to add the shim if you aren't getting the results you're expecting. With the shim the grind quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor!
customer_reviews.text: Don't click ...run from this coffee grinder. Before purchasing on Amazon I read numerous reviews. Decided this was the coffee grinder for me and what a mistake. Difficult to get a fine grind. Motor stopped after 14 months. Guess what? Warranty just one year.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home espresso, changed my entire experience on the first day
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an all-in-one grinder to this specifically for espresso. The Sette gets the job done efficiently and consistently, which is important for pulling good espresso. I was skeptical about spending the money, but it was well worth it. I notice the weight is not dead on every time, but the intelligent scale does seem to realize it missed and adjusts its expectations. Usually only noticeably off when I change coarseness or change beans. There are cheaper iterations that don’t have the weight feature, but I found it was worth including to reduce my startup time - instead of single dosing and weight after time, I can get right to tamping.
customer_reviews.author: W. Suhr

customer_reviews.title: good to go
customer_reviews.text: This grinder kicks ass, yeah it is somewhat pricey, but you don't want this thing breaking down, do you? Pay the money and read the instructions, including the online in depth instructions. I wasn't following those initially, and had some problems, after reading them, good to go, use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder with 2 negatives
customer_reviews.text: I love the grinder, very consistent, fast, and the built scale is a great feature, the only down side it’s messy, you will ground coffee all over the place, and it’s extreamly noisy due to the plastic frame and the lack of sound insulation.
customer_reviews.author: khaled

customer_reviews.title: Dosing directly into a porta filter simply does not work.  Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: The portafilter vibrates, the unit stops, it's glitchy. Totally frustrating and useless. It only works when dosing into the supplied cup and then transferring to the portafilter which is messy and then makes the extra cost for the weight dosing useless. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rickard

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good espresso grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good espresso grinder. Easy to dial in to get the best grinds possible for your espresso machine. Yes it is loud but no louder than my wife's coffee machine with built in grinder. The grinder is fast and the weight feature pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Simply stopped working spontaneously. No burn smell, no signs of trouble—motor simply stopped running after very light use of 1 and a half year Service was relatively painless to have the motor replaced (120 including shipping)
customer_reviews.author: Dimak

customer_reviews.title: This thing is excellent
customer_reviews.text: After a week of experimenting with the Sette 270wi, I’m hooked. Took a few doses to calibrate the weight dosing system, from then it’s been dosing 17.9-18.1g shots every time, even when playing around with grind size. Speaking of which, the grind size is incredibly consistent. I’ve read complaints of occasional clumps in the sette models, but I haven’t seen any hints of that so far. Download the app and install the firmware update immediately, as this resets everything
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grinder. Best so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinder. Very fast delivery and service. It took some time to set up. The hopper was not secure and the grind level would not advance beyond 18. I had to seek help online. Once up and running it is the best. Works great with espresso machines and other brew methods. The scale is a very useful tool. It is great at consuming the entire load without residue. I am still unsure if it will be the best for single dosing.
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: did'nt last long, wont be buying Baratza again.
customer_reviews.text: the machine didn't last long, for its price I would expect at least 5 years of service instead I got much less...
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee every morning :-)
customer_reviews.text: It took time to understand how it works or how to set the machine properly. But once I setup, it works easily as push a button once or twice and makes me realize how tasty coffee could be. Thanks to this machine, I am motivated to make a cup of cafe latte every morning instead of every weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Akiko Kobayashi

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of tries to get it dialed in. I use the cup to grind into so there's no waste. I get no clumping at all with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo662

customer_reviews.title: Easy and precise
customer_reviews.text: Can easily set the exact weight and fineness of the grind. I have it pre-set to do the exact amount for a Keurig solo cup.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Effortless perfection
customer_reviews.text: Grinds a perfect espresso. We love the weight feature. Now we just push a button and the perfect amount of perfectly ground espresso falls into our filter cup.
customer_reviews.author: Hux

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful grind that fills the portafilter perfectly without spilling over. A little noisy, but a very fast fill! Easy to set up, but make sure you level it/follow set up instructions for calibration.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan F.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and comsistent
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Encore. A bit pricey for an amateur espresso enthusiast, bit best decision I could have made. Consistency is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Fedro S. Zazueta

customer_reviews.title: Amazon fullfillment issues
customer_reviews.text: My first Sette 270w came opened and with the release lock broken off. I returned it for another Sette 270w which appears to be DOA -- pressing the button to grind does and the machine constantly tries to reset itself. From what I can tell the machine looks nice, but there appears to be serious quality control issues with these devices. Will be returning again. EDIT: Revising to 5 stars. I tried a third, this time not from Amazon fullfilment (Seattle Coffee Gear), and the grinder arrived well packed and unopened. Once you get a working model, the built-in weighting functionality is super useful -- basically one click to get freshly grown coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Broke 3 times!
customer_reviews.text: I got this grinder right after it came out, and its broken several times: 1. the motor went bad. 2. the grind adjustment would come loose. In both of the previous cases, Baratza fixed it for free, which was at least nice. But now its not jammed up again and I can't get it to grind correctly any more. In any case, the scale doesn't work well enough for it to be worth it, I think a timed grind is actually better than a scale. Switching to a higher quality model from a different brand, I can't depend on this grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Matsuoka

customer_reviews.title: Love this Grinder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grinder! I have owned quite a few others, but this one is great. No waste, fast, easy to setup, repeatable settings. Some complain that this grinder is loud, sheesh, it isn't on long enough to be loud. I am mainly an espresso or an americano drinker and it does that very well. Stepless settings are easy and stay where you set them.
customer_reviews.author: Mojodad

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product--basically no static, grinds stay put--weight is basically +/- .5 a gram.
customer_reviews.author: Beef Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I'd buy it again. OK, so in my experience, it does overshoot the set weight by about 0.5 grams but it's consistent and that what's important! I don't mind the overshoot as long as it's repeatable. I don't think you can do better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for Espresso; Good for press & pour over; Watch the mess
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great grinder. Precision fineness resolution, FAST, flow through grinding makes for cup-by-cup selection of beans, grind-by-weight accuracy is tight. Doesn't go super coarse so not for a mostly French press household; a bit noisy with the flow through but SO FAST it's a nit. Only thing stopping it from being a "5" is the speed results in grinds bouncing out of the porta-filter AND the basket. Once I've figured out how to stop that, I can come back to bump the rating to a five!
customer_reviews.author: Dettabra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grinder. Makes awesome espresso
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grinder. I use it with Breville BES920XL Dual Boiler Espresso Machine. Makes awesome espresso, better than any coffee shop around my area. Easy to use. Very consistent and precise dosage. Super fast. The range on the fine side is more than I need with Breville. I debated between 270 and 270W. I can't really compare them, but I am glad I went with 270W. People talk about it being very noisy. Maybe my expectation was lower, but it is not noisy at all for a coffee grinder. The only thing that I can see maybe improved is that grind adjustment feel a bit flimsy. It's not bad, just can be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Seavan

customer_reviews.title: App integration is cool if you care
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect but very pleased. Looks great on the counter. The Acaia app integration is automatic and works well too. The main issues are making sure that the weight is a true read by adjusting the cup each time off the wall. There were a few times where I didn’t adjust and the grinder kept going but wasn’t registering weight. Ended up with 80 grams of ground coffee when I called up 24g. This also doesn’t grind very coarse. For my brewing methods, all the way to Chemex, it works fine. I tossed the French press though.
customer_reviews.author: ATXbound

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder and fantastic customer experience
customer_reviews.text: Best grinder I have used. If you make espresso daily, this thing is so much less hassle and mess. grinds are accurate and highly adjustable. Getting better results than my old Gaggia MDF wiith a Gaggia Classic. [Oct 2018 Update] - Since I originally purchased this grinder the company updated the product to enhance the grind by weight accuracy - I just want to say how impressive it was for the company to offer current owners a very reasonable price to upgrade their 270w to the 270wi ($30 part + ~3 s/h). Baratza customer service was really helpful and I very much appreciate the ability to upgrade at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle F

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder, maybe not the best for coarser grinds
customer_reviews.text: Great grinder, love the weight based grinding for consistency. One note is that this isn't the best grinder if you want to make something that requires a coarser grind since the device can't really grind that large. Its meant for espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Carr

customer_reviews.title: Puts the fun back in grinding!
customer_reviews.text: I love measuring things, and this brings measurement to coffee grinding. A little fiddly, but a great grind. My only request would be something that snaps on to catch spilled grinds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Vario for a few years...always struggled to get a consistent grind. The Sette is a HUGE improvement. It's easy to dial in the perfect grind...and keep it. The micro setting wheel is great for small tweaks for batch variations. Spend the extra money for the W model. Well worth it. I usually get +-.1 grams on a 50 gram grind.
customer_reviews.author: Kingo

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good grinder. Installing the burr can be slightly annoying ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good grinder. Installing the burr can be slightly annoying -- the alignment mechanism wasn't well designed. I ordered a coarse burr from Baratza for use with drip and pour over. I'd recommend that burr if you intend on using this for anything other than espresso. I would have liked to have seen a metal frame construction. Grind quality is consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: good grinds but an absolute mess
customer_reviews.text: Great grinds but an absolute mess Contacted customer service more than a week ago and have yet to hear back Unfortunately this is probably going to be returned
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Sette
customer_reviews.text: A little more than I wanted to spend but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Alex V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Hands down the best grinder for espresso at home.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to use. It works like a charm. I only wish it had a coarser setting for french press
customer_reviews.author: Irfan Uddin

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: There appear to be a lot of fake reviews for this thing because it really blows away everything out there. This grinder will put competitors out of business so I can imagine that they need to write as many fake reviews as possible. Is it loud? Most definitely. But it is faster and more consistent than anything out there at any price. It won't go coarse enough for a French press but that isn't enough to take stars away. If you have an espresso machine, this is the only grinder to have unless you're running a commercial operation.
customer_reviews.author: oqeirjq38jo0

product_meta.title: Baratza Sette 270Wi-Grind by Weight Conical Burr Grinder
feature_bullets: SPECIALTY COFFEE ASSOCIATION AWARD WINNING GRINDERS - The Sette 270W was awarded Best New Product 2016 at Specialty Coffee Association Expo. Baratza grinders are preferred by coffee professionals and backed by Baratza’s world class support.

GRIND BY WEIGHT - The first ever espresso grinder to offer a grind-by-weight feature, using Acaia weighing technology and bluetooth functionality, with 3 programmable dosing buttons for accurate, consistent dosing to within a 10th of a gram.

EXCEPTIONAL ESPRESSO GRINDER - The Sette delivers beautiful espresso and is also capable of grinding for manual brewing methods requiring a finer grind (e.g. Aeropress, Hario V60, Chemex, some drip brewers).
270 GRIND SETTINGS - Macro/Micro adjustment for the most precise dial-in capabilities. A built-in convertible device holder allows for convenient change between a portafilter or supplied grounds bin.
HIGH SPEED GRINDING - Up to 5g/second and minimal retention in the innovative straight-thru grind mechanism.
